name: pm5.74i
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: mpbi(wb(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2)), wi(w0, wb(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| wb(wi(w0, wb(w1, w2)), wb(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| wb(wi(w0, wb(w1, w2)), wb(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2)))

body.origin: |- wb(wi(w0, wb(w1, w2)), wb(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2)))

comment: Distribution of implication over biconditional (inference form). (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)
